title: Where Has Grima Stowed It? (4R214)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot Grima to discard a possession borne by an ally or unbound companion.
Lore:	”'Loth was he to render up the keys. Many other things are there which men have missed.'”
Rarity:	R
